import React from "react"; import { Spring, animated } from "react-spring/renderprops"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faSuitcase } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import "./Clarify.css"; const Clarify = () => (
{props => ( )}

CLARIFY

Soothing

Dealing with spots, pimples and irritation? Clarify employs deep-pore and deep-tissue cleansing to remove excess oils, stimulate circulation, prevent further breakouts and soothe skin.

LEARN MORE

); export default Clarify;
